last_episode_to_air.name: Bigfoot's Doorstep
last_episode_to_air.overview: An elite team of Sasquatch specialists journeys into the unforgiving Northern California wilderness in search of Bigfoot.

name: Expedition Bigfoot
overview: An elite team of Sasquatch specialists journey into the unforgiving Oregon wilderness in search of Bigfoot. The three-week expedition, based on science and expertise, may finally pull the elusive beast out of the pages of legend and lore and into reality.

episodes.name: The Search Begins
episodes.overview: An elite team of specialists use an advanced data algorithm to pinpoint when and where to encounter Bigfoot. Armed with the latest technology, they venture into the unforgiving forests of central Oregon in search of the elusive beast.

episodes.name: Did You Hear That?
episodes.overview: With one team member down, Russell and Mireya head back into the forest to hunt down their leads; their intense investigation uncovers their first pieces of possible Bigfoot evidence.

episodes.name: The Nest
episodes.overview: As Bryce works with Jeff Meldrum to analyze the hair sample, Russell discovers a structure he believes is a Bigfoot nest; new team member Ronny joins Mireya in a race to the nest to collect DNA samples that will break open the investigation.

episodes.name: Red Eyes at Night
episodes.overview: Mireya and Ronny make a powerful discovery in the area surrounding the nest. When Russell suddenly falls ill, Bryce tests the theory that Bigfoot can render humans sick by emoting infrasound and is doing this to keep the team out of its territory.

episodes.name: Human Bait
episodes.overview: The team plants tiny trackers around the clearing hoping they will cling to Bigfoot's fur. Mireya and Ronny return to where they heard whistles and saw glowing eyes. This time they have a plan: Mireya agrees to be bait in order to lure out Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Moon Rising
episodes.overview: After Russell records thermal imagery he's convinced is Bigfoot, Bryce hurries to have the footage analyzed by experts. The evidence is staggering. Mireya and Ronny have a terrifying experience when they realize they're not alone in the forest.

episodes.name: It Knows We're Here
episodes.overview: Mireya’s darkest nightmare comes true. Russell investigates a possible Bigfoot underwater passageway. Bryce secures an airship to survey the final square miles for Bigfoot's heat signature.

episodes.name: The Final Hours
episodes.overview: The team believes they’ve finally narrowed down where Bigfoot has been hiding throughout their expedition. A high-tech drone is brought in to investigate, and what takes place next is truly astonishing!

episodes.name: The Search Continues
episodes.overview: After coming closer than ever to proving the existence of Bigfoot in Oregon, the team continues their search in the mountains of Kentucky. They'll spend the next two and a half weeks in search of Sasquatch -- unless it finds them first.

episodes.name: Call and Response
episodes.overview: After receiving a recording of an alleged Bigfoot call, Bryce blasts the howl over a speaker to elicit a response. With Russell positioned high on a hill and Ronny and Mireya down in the valley below, the team may get the encounter they're looking for.

episodes.name: Creepy Hollows
episodes.overview: Deep in a Kentucky hollow, Mireya and Ronny encounter several unidentified creatures responding to Bryce's recording of a Bigfoot howl. Their investigation of an old mining road uncovers an enormous footprint, confirming they are on the right track.

episodes.name: Hand of the Beast
episodes.overview: The expedition takes an intriguing turn when Bryce comes across a photograph of a human-like hand with claws. Ronny and Mireya use never-before-seen tech to narrow down their search after a piece of potential evidence washes away in a thunderstorm.

episodes.name: Time's Running Out
episodes.overview: With just three days left in the Kentucky expedition, the team investigates a strange tree structure that could be key to proving the existence of Bigfoot. A bloodhound tracker leads them further up Pine Mountain and to a mysterious cave entrance.

episodes.name: Bigfoot's Lair?
episodes.overview: The team discovers a Kentucky cave system that may be Bigfoot's lair.

episodes.name: The Quest Out West
episodes.overview: The team explores a new target zone in the Bigfoot capital of the world.

episodes.name: Dark Memories
episodes.overview: Bryce enlists a hypnotist to unlock the memories of a Bigfoot witness.

episodes.name: Paranormal Anomaly
episodes.overview: The team investigates strange reports of Bigfoot turning invisible.

episodes.name: The Government Knows
episodes.overview: Strange unmarked helicopters stalk the team through the Olympic Peninsula.

episodes.name: Lake Fear
episodes.overview: The team treads on dangerous ground as it scopes out a Bigfoot hideout.

episodes.name: Closer Than Ever
episodes.overview: The investigation launches into high gear as the team discovers evidence that could prove Bigfoot’s existence once and for all. When uncontrolled wildfires erupt in Washington, it’s a race against time to find the truth before it burns away.

episodes.name: Strange Returns
episodes.overview: The team returns to the Olympic Peninsula with a plan to lure out a Bigfoot by releasing primate pheromones. But after Ronny and Mireya see something watching them, and Russell is blindsided, it becomes clear -- the hunters are now the hunted.

episodes.name: Shadow Stalker
episodes.overview: Russell tracks a massive creature to a box river canyon but finds he can't escape a shadowy figure on the prowl. Bryce discovers Bigfoot is lured in by whistling, while Ronny and Mireya realize something is watching them from across their base camp.

episodes.name: Stalked in Terror
episodes.overview: A mysterious shadow figure gets too close for Ronny and Mireya's comfort. Russell tracks a large creature along a well-used game trail but quickly realizes he's being stalked in return. Bryce makes an unsettling discovery at the bottom of a lake.

episodes.name: Creatures in the Trees
episodes.overview: The team ascends massive pine trees in search of evidence from above. Bryce uncovers government secrets that may include underground bunkers. A 3D image specialist discovers possible man-made structures deep in the forest and captures a ghostly image.

episodes.name: Fresh Kills
episodes.overview: Ronny, Mireya and Bryce search for a top-secret government research facility hidden beneath the forest, and a witness comes forward with his up-close encounter with Bigfoot. Meanwhile, Russell is unnerved by a gruesome discovery.

episodes.name: Return to Lake Fear
episodes.overview: The investigation reaches a fever pitch as the team uncovers a potential Bigfoot kill zone directly above Lake Fear. Thrilled by their findings, they launch a squadron of patrol drones to sweep the area for definitive proof of the existence of Sasquatch.

episodes.name: Where the Legend Began
episodes.overview: The team has a truly shocking sighting, only to see their best lead yet lead slip through their fingers. But a groundbreaking tip leads Bryce to wrap up their expedition in Washington State and relocate to a new Bigfoot hot spot.

episodes.name: Sounds of Terror
episodes.overview: At their new base camp in California, the team records a howl unlike anything they've heard before. Later, Bryce learns of a potential Bigfoot coverup by the US government. And Russell, Ronny and Mireya come face-to-face with danger while on a night hunt.

episodes.name: Tracks to Hell
episodes.overview: Russell finds fresh clues along an abandoned railroad track, while Ronny and Mireya experience a hotbed of unexplained sounds deep in the forest. Bryce learns chilling new information about the history of Bigfoot in Northern California.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: Russell uses an unlikely ally to pursue a strange predator, while Bryce investigates the team's recent run-ins with mysterious floating orbs. After an invasion of their base camp, Ronny and Mireya use modern means to track a creature in the woods.

episodes.name: The Chase is On
episodes.overview: Using new tracking technology, Russell gets closer to his quarry than ever before. Bryce learns that Bigfoot may have psychic powers, leading Ronny to use an unusual technique to draw one out. And Mireya is startled by strange lights in the night.

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.overview: A visibly shaken Ronny and Mireya want answers about the unexplained activity they encountered the night before, while Bryce is baffled by strange lights on the security camera. The expedition takes a frightening turn when a team member goes missing.

episodes.name: A Massive Discovery
episodes.overview: The team pulls out all the stops to corner Bigfoot. Mireya travels on horseback to find evidence, while Ronny recruits a psychic specialist to hone in on the creature. Finally, Russell catches sight of what could be real proof of Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Into Bigfoot's Den
episodes.overview: When Russell films a shocking piece of video evidence, the whole team assembles to follow the trail. After a grueling journey through treacherous terrain, their search culminates in a monumental discovery.

episodes.name: New Discoveries
episodes.overview: Nearly a year after being forced out of Washington State by wildfires, the team reviews their previous investigation into the existence of Bigfoot. They reveal startling new evidence and get insight from legendary primatologist Dr. Jane Goodall.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Island
episodes.overview: After finding strange evidence in California, the team journeys to Prince of Wales Island, Ala., to find Bigfoot; as mysterious screams terrify the locals, Ronny, Mireya and Russell uncover chilling proof that they're not alone in the wilderness

episodes.name: Demon in the Dark
episodes.overview: Ronny suspects a shapeshifting monster from Alaskan lore may be responsible for the haunting howls he and Mireya heard near a remote lake. Russell chases a bipedal creature on a rampage, and Bryce analyzes potential Yeti hairs with shocking results

episodes.name: Tunnel of Terror
episodes.overview: Russell uses a robotic dog to explore an abandoned mine and discovers some unusual evidence.

episodes.name: Dual Pursuit
episodes.overview: Evidence of a cloaked Bigfoot leads the team to investigate around the abandoned mine, while Ronny and Mireya try a baiting technique, Russell tracks strange sounds to a mysterious grove; Bryce stumbles across evidence of a possible missing person

episodes.name: Low Tide, High Danger
episodes.overview: After being stalked and hearing strange whistles, Ronny and Mireya decide to launch a sound trap; Russell finds himself trapped after pursuing a possible Bigfoot on a nearby island; Bryce learns a witness was withholding terrifying information.

episodes.name: Tracking Terror
episodes.overview: Strange sounds lead to a disturbing discovery for Ronny and Mireya. Bryce hears blood-curdling screams near the target zone. And Russell tracks a mysterious creature as it makes its way to the mainland

episodes.name: Nocturnal Nightmare
episodes.overview: When a Bigfoot tracker is taken from Prince of Wales Island, the team decides to split up. While Russell and Mireya investigate suspicious heat signatures on the mainland, Ronny stays back and encounters something unseen in his camp. And Bryce makes a remarkable discovery

episodes.name: The Hand of Bigfoot
episodes.overview: Following their discovery of possible Bigfoot handprints, the team splits up to investigate mysterious tracks that lead to an icy and perilous glacier

episodes.name: Breeding Ground
episodes.overview: Bryce Johnson, Dr. Mireya Mayor, and Russell Acord have scoured North America in search of the cryptid known as Bigfoot. Now, they've returned to northern California to explore compelling evidence and unlock this centuries-old mystery -- once and for all

episodes.name: Nests of Giants
episodes.overview: Deep in the Northern California wilderness, Russell stops at nothing to reach a nesting site while Mireya and Bryce uncover evidence that a family of Bigfoot is nearby. Meanwhile, Ben speaks with a witness who had a chilling encounter with Bigfoot

episodes.name: The Watchers
episodes.overview: Deep in Northern California's lost coast, an audio expert joins the fold after the team hears unusual sounds. Russell must take shelter from a storm, and Bryce speaks with a local Hoopa Tribal Council member after reviewing illuminating footage

episodes.name: Primal Fear
episodes.overview: Russell searches a rugged hillside full of caves in Northern California's forests; Bryce speaks with a witness who hears frightening grunts; Mireya and Tobe Johnson expand their search area to determine if Bigfoot is mimicking animal sounds

episodes.name: Watch Your Step
episodes.overview: Russell discovers new sights and sounds deep in the backcountry of Northern California. Bryce talks with a witness who had an experience with a family of Bigfoot, and Mireya reaches new heights in search of physical evidence of the elusive creature.

episodes.name: Smells Like Bigfoot
episodes.overview: In NorCal's backcountry, the team develops a clear plan of attack to lure Bigfoot out of hiding; Russell travels overnight, hoping to gather key evidence in their search; Mireya and Bryce conduct an investigation unlike any other.

episodes.name: The Gathering Storm
episodes.overview: The team's investigations converge as Bryce, Mireya and Russell discover tree structures on different sides of the same mountain; as a storm approaches, Bryce prepares an AI-powered surveillance array that will help pinpoint Bigfoot's location.

episodes.name: Bigfoot's Doorstep
episodes.overview: An elite team of Sasquatch specialists journeys into the unforgiving Northern California wilderness in search of Bigfoot.
